channel.title: Running Problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been trying to code a little on my server wich was going pretty good. However after compiling something I can't get my server to come online anymore. I get the following error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.exceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2 at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCList<NPCHandler.java:3264> at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:62> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:64> Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
I really don't know what to do and really bummed that this is happening now I finally started to enjoy the scripting. Anyone knows how to help me? Please make it detailed becasue I still am a beginner.
Thanks allready,
Unique

item.title: Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

I’ve rebooted my PC and the error is still the same. Any other suggestions? Please I really want to get this thing working again.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

you already have another server window opened

Read full topic

item.title: Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

I think I’ve used tabs everywhere. However I found a part where I was working on and I delted that. But the error I have is bigger now:

Loaded clipmap in 62ms.
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: Launching HyBriD PvP…
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: Exception in thread “main” [5/5/11 10:52 PM]: java.n
ception: Address already in use: bind
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Serv
hannelImpl.java:126)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSo
or.java:59)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketA
egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketA
ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketA
orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.
reservingRunnable.java:51)
[5/5/11 10:52 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
Press any key to continue . . .

I hope this gives more information. Any suggestions? Because I’ve checked my maps but I think i’ve used tabs everywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

you probably formatted the shop config file wrong. make sure you used tab instead of spaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Make sure you used tabs for the shops.

item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Any ideas?

item.title: Running Problem

item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve been trying to code a little on my server wich was going pretty good. However after compiling something I can’t get my server to come online anymore. I get the following error:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.exceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCListNPCHandler.java:3264
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.NPCHandler.java:62
at server.Server.Server.java:64
Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

I really don’t know what to do and really bummed that this is happening now I finally started to enjoy the scripting. Anyone knows how to help me? Please make it detailed becasue I still am a beginner.

Thanks allready,

Unique
